page.title: 19Roads
page.content: There are many different roads in the D block. Some are big, wide and busy like the B4009 which runs from Goring to Wallingford in one direction and to Readng in the other. It passes our chool and on the 1Oth of June we found 1344 vehicles went by between 8:30am and 2:30pm. Some roads are small,narrow and quiet like Elvendon Rd.to Woodcote or the road to Ipsden. One of the most dangerous spots is where the High St.meets the B4009 over the railway bridge. In the High Street the corner by the Post Office is dangerous because it is narrow and people park on the double yellow lines. Goring has lots of cul de sacs and they are very quiet and good for children playing.
